description: Integrated course in systematic gross anatomy basic to further study in field of human movement. Introduction to musculoskeletal system, neuroanatomy & all visceral systems.
restricted: Restricted to students enrolled in the BClinExP (Hons), BENS, BExSS (Hons), BHSPE (Hons), BHlthSc and BOccHlth&SafeSc (Hons) programs only.
